source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_contact_information_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_contact_information_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_contact_information_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.contactid IS NULL
        THEN T3.ContactInformationID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS ContactInformationID,
    T1.contactid                    AS ContactID,
    T1.case_number                  AS CaseNumber,
    T1.case_created_date            AS CaseCreatedDate,
    T1.typeofinvolvement            AS TypeOfInvolvement,
    T1.contacttype                  AS ContactType,
    T1.firstname                    AS FirstName,
    T1.lastname                     AS LastName,
    T1.postname                     AS PostName,
    T1.title                        AS Title,
    T1.salutation                   AS Salutation,
    T1.suffix                       AS Suffix,
    T1.pobox                        AS POBox,
    T1.address1                     AS Address1,
    T1.address2                     AS Address2,
    T1.city                         AS City,
    T1.county                       AS County,
    T1.postcode                     AS Postcode,
    T1.country                      AS Country,
    T1.telephoneoffice              AS TelephoneOffice,
    T1.telephonemobile              AS TelephoneMobile,
    T1.fax                          AS Fax,
    T1.email                        AS Email,
    T10.LPAID                       AS LPAID,
    T1.organisationname             AS OrganisationName,
    T1.organisationtypename         AS OrganisationTypeName,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.case_number,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.case_created_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.contactid,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.typeofinvolvement,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.contacttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.firstname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lastname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.postname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.salutation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.suffix,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.pobox,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.address1,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.address2,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.city,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.county,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.country,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.telephoneoffice,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.telephonemobile,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.fax,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.email,'.'),
            IFNULL(T10.LPAID,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.organisationname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.organisationtypename,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields, so needs to be done
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_contact_information T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact T10 ON T1.lpacode = T10.LPACode AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim T3 ON T1.contactid = T3.ContactID AND
                                                                    T1.case_number = T3.CaseNumber AND
                                                                    T1.typeofinvolvement = T3.TypeOfInvolvement AND 
                                                                    T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.contactid = T3.ContactID AND 
            T1.case_number = T3.CaseNumber AND
            T1.typeofinvolvement = T3.TypeOfInvolvement AND 
        md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.case_number,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.case_created_date,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.contactid,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.typeofinvolvement,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.contacttype,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.firstname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lastname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.postname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.salutation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.suffix,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.pobox,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.address1,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.address2,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.city,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.county,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.country,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.telephoneoffice,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.telephonemobile,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.fax,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.email,'.'),
                IFNULL(T10.LPAID,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.organisationname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.organisationtypename,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.ContactID IS NULL -- new PositionCode
            THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y')
    AND T1.contactid IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_contact_information);
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_contact_information_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_contact_information_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    ContactInformationID,
    CaseNumber,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ContactID,
    TypeOfInvolvement,
    ContactType,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    PostName,
    Title,
    Salutation,
    Suffix,
    POBox,
    Address1,
    Address2,
    City,
    County,
    Postcode,
    Country,
    TelephoneOffice,
    TelephoneMobile,
    Fax,
    Email,
    LPAID,
    OrganisationName,
    OrganisationTypeName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_contact_information_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    ContactInformationID,
    CaseNumber,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ContactID,
    TypeOfInvolvement,
    ContactType,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    PostName,
    Title,
    Salutation,
    Suffix,
    POBox,
    Address1,
    Address2,
    City,
    County,
    Postcode,
    Country,
    TelephoneOffice,
    TelephoneMobile,
    Fax,
    Email,
    LPAID,
    OrganisationName,
    OrganisationTypeName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim
WHERE ContactID IN (SELECT ContactID FROM casework_contact_information_dim_new WHERE ContactInformationID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_contact_information_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_contact_information_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    ContactInformationID,
    CaseNumber,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ContactID,
    TypeOfInvolvement,
    ContactType,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    PostName,
    Title,
    Salutation,
    Suffix,
    POBox,
    Address1,
    Address2,
    City,
    County,
    Postcode,
    Country,
    TelephoneOffice,
    TelephoneMobile,
    Fax,
    Email,
    LPAID,
    OrganisationName,
    OrganisationTypeName,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_contact_information_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_contact_information_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim AS Target
USING casework_contact_information_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.ContactInformationID = Target.ContactInformationID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        ContactInformationID,
        CaseNumber,
        CaseCreatedDate,
        ContactID,
        TypeOfInvolvement,
        ContactType,
        FirstName,
        LastName,
        PostName,
        Title,
        Salutation,
        Suffix,
        POBox,
        Address1,
        Address2,
        City,
        County,
        Postcode,
        Country,
        TelephoneOffice,
        TelephoneMobile,
        Fax,
        Email,
        LPAID,
        OrganisationName,
        OrganisationTypeName,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.ContactInformationID,
        Source.CaseNumber,
        Source.CaseCreatedDate,
        Source.ContactID,
        Source.TypeOfInvolvement,
        Source.ContactType,
        Source.FirstName,
        Source.LastName,
        Source.PostName,
        Source.Title,
        Source.Salutation,
        Source.Suffix,
        Source.POBox,
        Source.Address1,
        Source.Address2,
        Source.City,
        Source.County,
        Source.Postcode,
        Source.Country,
        Source.TelephoneOffice,
        Source.TelephoneMobile,
        Source.Fax,
        Source.Email,
        Source.LPAID,
        Source.OrganisationName,
        Source.OrganisationTypeName,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_contact_information_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ContactInformationID NULLS LAST) AS ContactInformationID,
    CaseNumber,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ContactID,
    TypeOfInvolvement,
    ContactType,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    PostName,
    Title,
    Salutation,
    Suffix,
    POBox,
    Address1,
    Address2,
    City,
    County,
    Postcode,
    Country,
    TelephoneOffice,
    TelephoneMobile,
    Fax,
    Email,
    LPAID,
    OrganisationName,
    OrganisationTypeName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim;
